title: NuVue Foods Recalls Burrito Products due to Misbranding and an Undeclared Allergen
summary: WASHINGTON, Nov. 9, 2018 NuVue Foods, a Hamtramck, Mich. establishment, is recalling approximately 268 pounds of ready-to-eat (RTE) chicken burrito products due to misbranding and an undeclared allergen, the U.S. Department of Agricultures Food Safety and Inspection Service (FSIS) announced today. The products contain egg...
